nodes.text: Magnetic thermal detonators were hemispherical versions of the Class-A thermal detonator manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc.. The flat surface was magnetized, allowing the detonator to be attached to metal objects, or to a bandolier for carrying.

In 19 BBY, Ahsoka Tano took several magnetic thermal detonators and a bandolier from a Pyke Syndicate armory on Oba Diah. She planted several of the detonators in a sansanna spice refinery, primarily to destroy the facility, with the explosions also providing a distraction allowing Ahsoka, Trace and Rafa Martez to escape their capture by the Pykes.
